nodes.text: Autonomous Walker JS-MW1 was a walker constructed by White Maw Overseer Droub. Following the death of Empress Vaylin and formation of the Eternal Alliance in 3630 BBY, the White Maw took over the Firefrost Lavaworks on Hoth, with Droub becoming the cruel overseer of the factory. The Alliance eventually saw his rise as a threat and dispatched a strike team to Firefost to liberate the slaves and put an end to the production. Droub attempted to stop the intruders with his Walker, but was eventually overwhelmed and killed, while the Walker was destroyed.
Autonomous Walker JS-MW1 appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as the final boss of the "Firefrost" Uprising.
